author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEBBY STRENGTHENING AS IT NEARS LANDFALL IN THE FLORIDA BIG  BEND... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE IN PORTIONS OF  FLORIDA AND MAJOR FLOODING IN THE SOUTHEASTERN UNITED STATES...
summary:
...DEBBY STRENGTHENING AS IT NEARS LANDFALL IN THE FLORIDA BIG  BEND... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE IN PORTIONS OF  FLORIDA AND MAJOR FLOODING IN THE SOUTHEASTERN UNITED STATES...
 As of 2:00 AM EDT Mon Aug 5
 the center of Debby was located near 29.1, -83.8
 with movement N at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 981 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
